name: NVIDIA GPU Monitor
description: Real-time GPU monitoring desklet showing compute usage, memory usage, and optional temperature with customizable colors and update intervals. Features multi-GPU support, error handling, and smooth animations.
author: Hierakonpolis
comments: A GPU monitoring desklet that uses nvidia-smi to display real-time usage charts with historical data, percentage labels, and customizable appearance. Requires nvidia-smi to be installed.
